<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1046400_auction_autoupdate</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1046400_auction_autoupdate">currencyISNOTEMPTYjavascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1046400_auction_autoupdate','currency', 'USD;USD')^EQ<item endquery="false" field="currency" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value="javascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_1046400_auction_autoupdate','currency', 'USD;USD')"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>autoupdate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {



    var c = parseInt(current.getValue('currency'));
    var d = Math.floor((Math.random() * 100) + 1);
    var result = parseInt(c + d);
    current.setValue('final_amount', result);



})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>CC-Harsha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-02 07:00:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1787dc7d1ba261109cb1639bbc4bcb5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>autoupdate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AuctionArc" source="x_1046400_auction">6e876ac81b2ae1109cb1639bbc4bcb2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AuctionArc">6e876ac81b2ae1109cb1639bbc4bcb2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1787dc7d1ba261109cb1639bbc4bcb5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>CC-Harsha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-02 08:35:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1787dc7d1ba261109cb1639bbc4bcb5b"/></record_update>
